title: Technical Communication Practicum
description: Supervised work experience in government, corporate, or volunteer setting, as approved by department chair. Placement may be student or employer initiated or through Cooperative Education. Proposal, progress reports, and final report. Total credit limited to 8 units, with a maximum of 4 units per quarter. Credit/No Credit grading only.
prerequisites: Senior standing and at least two of the following: ENGL 148 or ENGL 149, ENGL 210, ENGL 310, ENGL 317, ENGL 408, ENGL 411, ENGL 412
